Clauses.English: against a victim or a civil party, either to prevent him or her from reporting an offence or seeking reparation for harm
against a witness to prevent him or her from testifying at an investigation, a judicial investigation, a trial or in the proceedings of other complaints
against a victim or a civil party for reporting an offence or seeking reparation for harm suffered
against a witness for testifying at an investigation, a judicial investigation, a trial or in the proceedings of other complaints
